theDefault:DefaultOrb.NAME: Default Orb

theDragonkin:InvigoratingBloom.NAME: Invigorating Bloom
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, Gain 1 Energy and increase the Healing done by this by 1.

theDragonkin:ThornBloom.NAME: Hungry Bloom
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, Deal #b
Damage to a random enemy and increase Block gained by this by #b

theDragonkin:ToxicBloom.NAME: Toxic Bloom
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, Deal #b
Damage to ALL #yPoisoned enemies and increase #Poison applied by this by #b

theDragonkin:PrimalBloom.NAME: Primal Bloom
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn Non-Primal Bloom #yPassive effects are increased by #b
NL #yEvoke: Activate the passive effects of your other Blooms.
